lead_paragraph: Out-of-favour England wicketkeeper Jos Buttler is being encouraged by coach Trevor Bayliss to play in this year's Indian Premier League (IPL) to hone his limited overs skills.

headline.print_headline: England Coach Gives Buttler IPL Green Light
headline.main: England Coach Gives Buttler IPL Green Light

snippet: Out-of-favour England wicketkeeper Jos Buttler is being encouraged by coach Trevor Bayliss to play in this year's Indian Premier League (IPL) to hone his limited overs skills....
